name: Code_H
description:
- Protect our planet from the human invaders!!! we don't have much, but we have one of the greatest pilots on the galaxy!! (the humans killed him so you go on his place)

- an early prototype please report any bugs that you find on the comment section down below

CONTROLS:

- WASD or arrows - move

- SPACE OR LEFTCLICK -  shoot

- currently working on more levels

future features:

- stealth levels

- move animations

- cel shader (maybe)

- original music

- comics between levels
